backend.blockpackage

Class BlockController

  • java.lang.Object
    • backend.blockpackage.BlockController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class BlockController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Author:
    Ivan Manoilov(xmanoi00), Farrukh Abdukhalikov(xabduk00)

    Class responsible for block communication between themselves and outer packages ( Facade Design Pattern ).

    See Also:
